markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Psyche](/Traits.aspx?ID=429)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 221</row>

Your psyche must be unleashed to use abilities that have the psyche trait, and they end automatically when your unleashed psyche subsides.
name: Psyche
